title: CrowdStrike launches Falcon Identity Protection for Microsoft Entra ID
summary: With this release, CrowdStrike extends its inline prevention to cloud-based Microsoft Entra ID, expanding its comprehensive identity protection for leading cloud-based identity providers, on-premises Active Directory (AD) and SaaS applications.

title: NinjaOne secures $500 Million funding to redefine automated endpoint management
summary: The funding will also support retaining the company’s overinvestment in world-class customer support as well as provide funding for the company’s pending acquisition of SaaS backup and data protection leader Dropsuite.

title: Cyber attacks on manufacturers up globally, but less than half prepared in security: Omdia
summary: Manufacturers affected by a cyber attack reported a resilience or availability issue that cost individual firms between US$200,000 and US$2 million, taking the biggest hit when incidents affected enterprise and corporate systems or production control.

title: OpenText launches next-gen OpenText Cybersecurity Cloud with AI threat detection and response
summary: OpenText is dedicated to helping organisations gain the strongest defense postures possible, in a machine-to-machine attack world.

title: Menlo Security acquires Votiro to deliver easy, AI-driven data security
summary: Together, Menlo Security and Votiro will enable enterprises to quickly and easily implement data security best practices without slowing employee and business productivity.

title: Verkada raises $200M in funding to deliver category-defining security solutions
summary: Since its founding in 2016, Verkada has raised more than $700 million in funding, and the latest round values the company at $4.5 billion.

title: Tenable strengthens its identity exposure capabilities to protect against compromises
summary: The combined power of Identity 360 and Exposure Center simplifies the identity management complexity, delivering unified visibility across identity providers to serve as a single source of truth.

title: MirrorTab secures $8.5M to shield web applications from evolving hacking, bot, and malware threats
summary: The company plans to use its seed funding to aggressively build out its innovative capabilities, integrations, and commercialise its availability.

title: TrustTech firm Gogolook launches news wall feature to Whoscall App
summary: The Scam Alert feature  in Gogolook is available in the Philippines, Taiwan, Thailand and Malaysia as well.

title: Philippines reports foreign cyber intrusions targeting intelligence data, but no breaches
summary: Advanced Persistent Threats or APTs have repeatedly attempted but failed to infiltrate government systems, suggesting the country's cyber-defences have held firm.

title: 40% of AI data breaches will arise from cross-border GenAI misuse by 2027: Gartner
summary: Gartner predicts by 2027, AI governance will become a requirement of all sovereign AI laws and regulations worldwide.
